# [Metaframe](https://metapages.org/): javascript runner


[![](https://mermaid.ink/svg/eyJjb2RlIjoiZ3JhcGggTFJcbiAgdGhpc1tbbWV0YWZyYW1lIGV4ZWN1dGVzIGphdmFzY3JpcHQgOl1dXG4gIGlucHV0W2phdmFzY3JpcHQgaW5wdXQgOl1cbiAgb3V0cHV0W2FueSBvdXRwdXRzIDpdXG4gIGlucHV0IC0tPiB0aGlzXG4gIHRoaXMgLS0-)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/edit##eyJjb2RlIjoiZ3JhcGggTFJcbiAgdGhpc1tbbWV0YWZyYW1lIGV4ZWN1dGVzIGphdmFzY3JpcHQgOl1dXG4gIGlucHV0W2phdmFzY3JpcHQgaW5wdXQgOl1cbiAgb3V0cHV0W2FueSBvdXRwdXRzIF1cbiAgaW5wdXQgLS0-)


This metaframe will execute javascript from code embedded in the URL hash params.

## Examples

### Listen to metaframe inputs, and send outputs:

[ðŸ‘‡ Below example live ðŸ”—](https://app.metapages.org/#?)

```javascript

const disposers = [];

// Listen to an input
disposers.push(metaframe.onInput("someInputName", (inputValue) => {
    // And send an output
    metaframe.setOutput("someOutputName", `Got input: ${inputValue}`);
}));

// Return a cleanup function
return () => {
    while(disposers.length > 0) {
        disposers.pop()();
    }
}

```

### Async

The script is run as an async function so you can await:

```javascript

const key = Math.random();
console.log(`Starting key=${key}`)

async function waitUntil(condition) {
  return await new Promise(resolve => {
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      if (condition) {
        resolve('foo');
        clearInterval(interval);
      };
    }, 1000);
  });
}

await waitUntil(1000);

console.log(`Finished key=${key}`)

return () => {
    console.log(`Cleaning up key=${key}`)
}

```
